text: Randy Sparks (born July 29, 1933) is an American folk guitarist and singer- songwriter.Palm Springs Walk of Stars by date dedicated He was born in Leavenworth, Kansas. He is the founder of The New Christy Minstrels and The Back Porch Majority.allmusic.com Accessed 2011-04-12. Sparks had the starring role in a 1960 movie drama, The Big Night. Sparks also sang the opening credits of the theme song of the 1958 movie Thunder Road. ==References== ==Other websites== * * New Christy Minstrels website * Randy Sparks discography at Discogs Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:American guitarists Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American folk singers Category:American folk musicians Category:American movie actors Category:People from Leavenworth, Kansas Category:Actors from Kansas Category:Musicians from Kansas Category:Singers from Kansas
title: Randy Sparks
